name: DAMN!
description: DAMN the machines! DAMN the machines! Nobody knows who put a virus in the Lab.34 LAN, but now the smartest robots produced in the lab have started an uprising against their creators! Scientists and technicians are trapped inside and surely face certain death, can you help them?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5Ghz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible/modern shader support DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
